original_text: Immediately, the men who wanted to hit Paul with whips moved away from him. The leader of the soldiers was also very afraid. He had tied chains around Paul's arms and legs. He knew that he should not have done that to a citizen of Rome.
korean_text: 심문하려던 사람들이 곧 그에게서 물러가고 천부장도 그가 로마 시민인 줄 알고 또 그 결박한 것 때문에 두려워하니라

sentences.original_text: Immediately, the men moved away from him
who wanted to hit Paul with whips
The leader of the soldiers was also very afraid
He had tied chains around Paul's arms and legs
He knew that he should not have done that
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그렇게 해서는 안 된다는 것을 알았다
